song_name: The Bad Things Are Back Again
metrics_conclusion: The Bad Things Are Back Again has higher complexity than the average song  in terms Melodic Complexity.
key_conclusion: The Bad Things Are Back Again has sections analyzed in the following keys: B♭ Major,  and B♭ Mixolydian.  Click on the linked cheat sheets for popular chords, chord progressions, downloadable midi files and more!
